body.name: Camii Webcam with Light - 1080P Webcam for PC with Built-in Privacy Cover & Mic, StreamCam, Plug and Play, Web Camera for Streaming, Online Learning, Zoom Meeting Skype Teams, Mac Laptop Desktop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: 🎁【Webcam with 3-Level/2-Mode Adjustable Ring Light】Featuring two lighting modes and a three-level brightness adjustment, this conference camera offers versatile lighting options and precise control over brightness, ensuring optimal visibility and enhancing the overall video conferencing experience.

🎁【Webcam with Built-in Privacy Cover】The built-in privacy cover on the webcam provides added security and peace of mind for you. It allows you to easily cover the camera lens when not in use, protecting your privacy from potential hackers or unauthorized access.

🎁【FHD 1080P Webcam】 The 90° wide angle lens captures true to life videos and images in 1080p (1920x1080) @ 30 fps. Perfect for Zoom / Facetime / Video Calling / OBS / Twitch / Facebook / YouTube / Xbox one / Conferencing / Gaming / Streaming / Recording / Online School.

🎁【Plug and Play & Tripod Stand】One plug to activate, and then go for play! No additional driver required for the set up, operating the usb webcam in just seconds.With the tripod stand, you can easily adjust the camera's height and angle to capture the best view during meetings or gaming.

🎁【Widely Compatible】InstyQ Webcam for laptop is compatible with Windows 7/10/11, MacOS10.10 or later, Linux, Android TV 7.0 or later. The compatibility of the streaming camera is super wide for major software like Zoom, Facetime, Google Meet, Skype, YouTube, Facebook and more. Whether this web camera is used for online studying/ teaching, home office, conference, meeting or video calling, the web camera is perfectly suitable for you as a tripod-ready universal clip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, very crisp picture, fast auto-focus and light covers well. Easy to install too.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My old CAM stopped working, and I looked for new and improved ones. I found this one with very nice specs and a great design, and I had to get one to try. I was not disappointed; this one has worked out great. First off, very easy to install. I like how this one is just plug-and-play. I also like that my streaming software is compatible, and the video and audio drivers are also picked up automatically for that. Secondly, it works great. I like how crisp the picture is and how well the focus is in the foreground and background at the same time. I also like the true-to-life built-in microphone with no audio loss or distortion, and it syncs perfectly with the video output. Hard to show how nice this one is with just pics, so I did a sample video to show. Lastly, the light. I like this ring light because It is soft and bright, has little reflection, and provides an amount of light for the face with no shadows. No cons, it worked out great for me, and I am very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, it’s a fantastic value.
reviews.reviewText: Seems well built and absolute plug and play for my Mac. The little clamp adjusts well and the picture quality is just fine. Audio picks up well too. I needed this to take FaceTime calls on my computer working on some audio projects. It accomplishes that goal in spades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, and portable, but only average picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Super simple set up. Just plug in the usb (also comes with an adaptor piece) and open from settings or with a video app. The tripod is small on only a few inches in height. The tripod screws in and out easily and the lip of the base sits properly on the laptop. I got because the camera on the laptop is not great (cuts out randomly) and I hate how I look on video calls/meetings. No more issues with the camera cutting off, which is really important. Perfect for on the go use. The picture quality improvement was not enough for me. Even with the backlight on the rim, there wasn’t much difference. A lot depends on the other lighting in the room, which usually can’t be significantly adjusted unless you are at home. It’s good for video calls and meetings but I wouldn't recommend for recording videos for work or business purposes.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camii 1080P Webcam: Privacy, Clarity and Light.
reviews.reviewText: The Camii webcam with light is a recommended product. It has good Image quality and the built-in privacy cover ensures peace of mind. The built-in lighting feature is great for low-light settings, and the microphone picks up clear audio. Easy setup and sleek design – a must for smooth video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A reliable and effective webcam.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this webcam primarily for work meetings, and it performs flawlessly. It's also suitable for streaming, especially in well-lit environments. The installation process is straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I was running out of USB ports and needed to consolidate anyways. I ordered this webcam on a whim but couldn't be happier. Very clear picture and the center light is great. The addition USB-C adapter was a very welcomed bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play
reviews.reviewText: This Webcam is great if you're like me and take a lot of zoom calls. The lighting was flattering on my face, great for selfies too. The best part about it is the plug and play since I alternate between multiple devices, this was exactly what I needed. Picture quality is very clear too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works great
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use just plugged it into my computer and it worked. The light on it is adjustable by just tapping it. Picture looks good perfect for zoom calls.

The best part is how easy it was to get started with it—literally plug and play, which was perfect for someone like me who isn't too tech-savvy. It also comes with a handy privacy cover, which is a simple but appreciated feature for added security when the cam isn't in use.The adjustable ring light was a standout feature, especially for those late-night Zoom calls, giving my video feed a much-needed boost in appearance, although it's not quite strong enough to light up a room. It's definitely a step up from my laptop's built-in camera, offering clearer video quality, but it's important to temper expectations. The picture can still appear grainy in lower light, even with the ring light on, which suggests it won't rival the clarity of newer smartphone cameras.I found it to be decent for daily work calls and the occasional streaming. The inclusion of features like the privacy cover and built-in light adds value, making it a worthwhile option for those looking to enhance their video call setup on a budget. Just keep in mind that while it improves your video quality, it's not going to blow you away if you're comparing it to high-end equipment. Overall, it's a practical choice that strikes a good balance between functionality and affordability.

reviews.reviewTitle: a 3.7 star product that won't brake the bank. But lacks in some areas.
reviews.reviewText: So lets get one thing clear. This is a 50$ webcam. So don't expect high quality video or pictures. But it does have better dynamic range and frame response then my old 2015 iMac's webcam.The build: This is an all plastic product with the exception of the small metallic lens accent peace and the tripod mount. Witch is made of a pliable hardened polymer. The camera's resolution is only 1080p. There is a small ring light that helps to eliminate harsh shadows caused buy poor lighting conditions. There is a long usb-A cord and a usb-A to C adapter dongle. That is included in the package.The picture quality:The images produced are comparable to an iPhone 6 at 1080p resolution. Although the images look similar with grain and video noise. The dynamic range is slightly better overall. Giving you a more complete picture with slightly better contrast. Don't expect high dynamic range, or high fidelity skin tone reproduction. Don't worry you won't look terrible but. It just cannot compare to the latest phones and tablets on the market.ring light:The thing that sets it apart is it's integrated ring light. But this feature lacks in overall brightness. Again it does mitigate the harshness of shadows and can act like a softer * fill light. But it can't even compete with ambient lighting in a room. So it might be better used in a late night chat session with the lights down low. To see an overall change in picture quality. The ring light has capacitive touch dimming with 4 modes. You can change colour temps from warm to cool. But warm would be your best option, since the white balance can get thrown off with the cooler colour temp.The mini tripod:This is a cool little addition that i found to be really nifty. It's an octopus style tripod made of ( flexible polymer ) that can be positioned and attached on different structures. It does give enough steadiness to the overall product to be a useful addition. It screws on the bottom with a traditional mounting point.Final thoughts: If you are looking for a cheeper webcam with an integrated ring light with capacitive touch. Then this little unit might be the right one for you. Even with it's flaws it does offer a nice package that has some really great ideas That sets it apart from others within this price bracket. My overall rating is a 3.7 out of 5.
Very good webcam with good resolution. I like the led light around it. It can be white or warm light it makes the camera more clear. It was easy to install.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for both desktop and laptop
reviews.reviewText: I have used this on my desktop where I don't already have a camera and it was an easy connect and setup. Calls over teams and zoom were clear without any distortion. I then also tried to use this with my laptop which had a built in camera, but this one's quality was far better especially because of the light around. There is also the built in privacy cover that snaps on and off which is great peace of mind not having to worry about that. Cord is also long enough to reach places.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good camera but light is weak
reviews.reviewText: Very easy setup. Camera works well. But the light is way too dim. Will be keeping my ring light.
